title: RIOT PLS... I only need 2 RP for Mecha Kha
body:
I just purchased RP for a Kha'zix {{champion:121}}  skin... but I came up 2 rp short http://puu.sh/bVvJT/37ce738473.jpg (proof)

So I decided to beg like any normal person since I couldn't spent anymore money for literally 2 riot points...
ALSO I DREW YOU ART TO HELP PAY FOR MY TWO RIOT POINTS NEEDED

{{champion:121}}{{champion:121}}{{champion:121}}{{champion:121}}{{champion:121}}{{champion:121}}{{champion:121}}{{champion:121}}{{champion:121}}{{champion:121}}{{champion:121}}{{champion:121}}{{champion:121}}{{champion:121}}{{champion:121}}{{champion:121}}{{champion:121}}{{champion:121}}{{champion:121}}{{champion:121}}{{champion:121}}{{champion:121}}{{champion:121}}{{champion:121}}{{champion:121}}{{champion:121}}{{champion:121}}{{champion:121}}{{champion:121}}{{champion:121}}{{champion:121}}{{champion:121}}

SO PLEASE RITO... FIND IT IN YOUR HEART: To give me two riot points pl0x :D.... Quickly before all the downvoters arrive! O_O''

replies.body:
Okay, first of all, that picture is hilarious! Nicely done. 

For something like this,  you'd need to contact Player Support by filling out a [ticket](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new). Be sure to attach your artwork! :D
:D THANKS FOR REPLYING! I gave support the picture (Without the background) but I'll make sure to slap it by them!
What gave you the idea to do this picture?

umm, the fact that its awesome?

I swear, some people...
lol
UMM {{champion:121}} 's a bug so..... I gave him a cane... because bugs have canes and TOP HAT yes.. that!
http://emertainmentmonthly.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/08/james-and-the-giant-peach.jpg

15hrs later...
I am beginning to doubt Rito's Support Ticket Center {{champion:32}} ...

I think this is the second or third time I've seen you on the boards, may I ask what exactly your job entails?  Also when did ~~they~~ you guys add a little title that tells people what Rioters' roles are?
Adorbs.... this, is gooooood....

http://i.imgur.com/L8Z1a1x.jpg

Give him mine, Its driving me nuts.
OMFG you have two rp exactly!!! XD LET ME CONSUME YOU!!! {{champion:121}}

actually that would be more of
OMFG you have two rp exactly!!! XD LET ME CONSUME YOU!!! {{champion:31}}
Lol but {{champion:121}}  evolves and gains what he eats, instead of just getting fatter like {{champion:31}}
{{champion:31}} {{champion:96}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:45}} {{champion:48}} {{champion:19}} {{champion:106}} {{champion:412}} CONSUME
You also forgot{{champion:75}} Q and passive.
But he doesn't eat them. Just smashes the pimp cane
The idea is that he "feeds" on your life force through his passive and Q, then again this is just a speculation.
I don't want every champ on this list tho, ur explaining life steal
Doge drains the soul{{champion:75}} I consider it eating~
Annnnnnd...{{champion:9}} {{champion:20}} {{item:3160}}
mmm good catch
{{champion:112}} =C you forgot me
wat? pls explain

RIOT DELIVERED

http://puu.sh/bWDa0/edf50472f2.jpg

...3
Riot gave me... 3 RP....
Riot gave me.... THREE RP!??
NOW I'M STUCK WITH 1 RP EXTRA!??? *Drops to the floor* NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!

This means Half Life 3 Confirmed!    -{{champion:74}}
xD Dude, I feel your pain, you should go to Player Support and write a nice detail explanation.
Thanks man, I'll totally hit them up with a nice detailed query about how much I need... not one, but two riot points c: {{champion:121}}
Maybe riot can add their two RP worth to this discussion... Get it? like the saying two cents worth? :D
i love your name, dear god yes.

It seems riot has yet to recognize my prestige drawing skills... perhaps more icons will help!

{{champion:121}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:121}}
Hook my buddy up. He is a super cool guy and plays a ton of league. <3
:D~ tanks {{champion:121}}
Up voted... maybe you will receive love.
Help this desperate man, he's in need of a penny-ful blessing   huehueheuhueu
dancing for free money plz

Do you sell your art? I might be interested in purchasing lol.  Havnt seen one of these threads in a while, good to see that it is lighthearted instead of just begging.

Rito plz this artist deserves it!
It's too bad you have to wait two weeks to gift...otherwise I'd just gift this skin to you, simply because you made me laugh my A** off. I hope you get the two RP :D

Haha, thanks dude! I'm still waiting on the reply to the support ticket
Hopefully other riot staff members will appreciate my artistic skills of... art!  {{champion:121}}
